name: LD46 - Last journey in the sand (+3 days version)
name_original: LD46 - Last journey in the sand (+3 days version)
description:
Travel with your trusty companion to the last safe place to live. Feed yourself and your mount from abandoned houses of those who already left. Beware, here the wolves get hungry.

 Controls  :

  • Arrow keys : to turn the camera
  • Left mouse button : 
    • on your tile to pass a turn
    • on a nearby valid tile to move there
    • on a building to take stuff in your inventory
    • on your character to scare the wolves around you
    • on the camel to load your stuff and leave (if near the edge of map)
